message: Let's split the money 70/30.  It's a good deal for both of us, especially considering the inflation!
Your offer was a bit unfair to me. How about we try a 60/40 split? This factors in the inflation a bit more.
I understand your point about the inflation, but I need a bit more to make it worthwhile. How about 65/35?
This is getting ridiculous.  I'm really trying to be fair with the inflation, but I won't accept less than 45%. Let's settle this now.
